runs.comm: blocked in to the ground
defended towards cover
angled away to third man and they jog a single
skips down the track and a well-timed cover drive splits the fielders and races to the boundary
attempts the same shot but gets a bottom edge in to the ground and a good diving stop.
goes for a straight drive but the balls hits of the top of his front pad
going down leg-side but swerves in viciously. Still a wide though
swinging away from McCullum and he takes a big swing and misses
turned through midwicket for a single
sharp bouncer deflects off Ryder's glove down towards fine leg
down the leg-side once more
swings in from leg to middle stump and McCullum hit's the drive on the full straight to mid-off
slower ball bouncer which McCullum takes a step towards before having another swipe and he doesn't connect
down the line of leg-side again but the balls clips off McCullum's foot
drove in to the covers
pitched up and Ryder plays slightly early and the ball hits high on the bat. The ball is straight over the bowlers head and drops safely in the outfield and they jog through two
angled away to third man
clubbed away and the ball flashes in the air past extra cover where the fielder makes a great attempt at the diving catch but to no avail
fuller ball on his toes and he flicks it away and the quick outfield beats the man trying to cover from deep square leg
pitched up and McCullum goes for the big shot. He miss-hits the shot and the ball floats to Benn at mid-off. Easy catch.
blocked in to the ground
fuller delivery dug away to point and good fielding saves runs
pitched up and Ross Taylor defends it high off the bat to square leg
slower ball but far too wide of off-stump this time
shorter ball again but Ryder leans back and pulls the ball over the fielder at square leg for a one-bounce four
good response. Slower and fuller and Ryder defends the ball in to his foot
still short of a length and an awkward short to help the ball away to short fine leg
smacks of the pads as Ryder misses the stroke but going down leg-side
drive to the off-side but picked up in the covers
mistimed shot again but the ball makes it safely over midwicket

communication break down in the middle as Taylor defends to point. Ryder comes half way up the track to be sent back by Taylor. The fielder takes a shy and he would have been miles out with the direct hit
swing and a miss from Taylor which drops down of his pads
he starts to come down the track which puts Baker of and he bowls wide of off-stump
makes solid contact and the ball is lifted high over midwicket and in to the middle of the crowd.

beautifully bowled. Going away from off-stump but the balls swings in a bit before nipping of the surface and turning in to the top of Jesse Ryder's off-stump. Great delivery and Edwards picks up a wicket first ball
flicked away to the gap at square leg. Picked up by the fielder on the boundary
full ball swinging away from off-stump and an uncomfortable block out to point
flicks it away through square leg again
great timing with the cover drive and the ball beats the two diving fielders and races away for four
shuffles across his stumps and turned off the hips down towards fine leg. In the air for a couple of seconds but no fielder near enough and the ball races away for four
aggressive full-toss above the waist of Taylor and signalled as a no-ball
cut away but picked up on the cover boundary
splits the inner field again but picked up on the boundary at deep cover once more
full toss drove to extra cover
full ball again and turns the ball away through square leg and it scampers away for four more
good length outside off stump and a swing and a miss
well-timed cut but a good stop in the field at point
blocked away to extra cover
not well timed but over the top of mid-on and the ball bounces away to the rope but the fielder gives chase
short of a length and a top edge loops over the keeper down to fine leg. Styris didn't know much about that
attempts a cut towards point but hit in to ground from Taylor
drop and run to midwicket and Taylor makes his ground in time
slower ball outside off which deceives the batsmen and through to the keeper
outside edge runs towards fine leg
placed in to the gap at mid-off
drove away to point
prodded away past a diving point and good running between the wickets for two
defended back to the bowler but a clumsy effort to stop by Benn and he kicks the ball away from him
cut away through backward point and picked up on the boundary rope
Styris is fooled by the bounce and it catches the top edge. The ball soars all the way over the keeper and in to a building site for six over fine leg! He certainly didn't mean that
tries to manipulated the ball and it bounces off the top edge again this time straight up in to the air and Pollard takes a routine catch
angled away to third man
quicker ball turned away to the gap at midwicket
defended in to the covers
leans it away down to third man
hit away past point
straight drive picked up at long-off
played down to the gap at long-off again
defended back to the bowler
flicked through the leg-side and picked up by the fielder at deep midwicket
edged away to third man and quick running for the single
fed down to the man at long-on and easy singles there
played off one knee and he drags it through midwicket and the ball races away for four
too short and Taylor gets underneath it and the balls flies straight over midwicket and a great one handed grab in the fourth row in the second tier of the stands
blocked in to the ground
dropped in to the gap at midwicket
flashing cut which he goes at hard and catches a thick outside edge but runs away for four all the same past third man
arm ball bouncing up outside off and play and a miss with the cut shot
fuller ball dug off the toes and a misfield at cover
defended back to the bowler
faster ball again and a thin inside edge on to the pads as the ball runs away to square leg
blocked away to the covers and they run one
pitched up outside leg-stump and Oram shuffles across only to miss with the big shot. Clips off the thigh pad through to the keeper
too short and pulled away through square leg but a great stop on the boundary
down the leg-side
fuller ball chipped away to long-on
inside edge spins away from the fielder at midwicket
driven in to the ground
flatter and fuller ball hacked away to short fine leg
finds the gap down at long-off
sliced away in the air over cover and it's a long boundary out there. Good catch taken on the boundary by Marshall. Oram just didn't quite get that in the middle of the bat
full again and a leading edge along the ground back to the bowler
flicked in to the gap at midwicket
dug out to long-off to get off the mark
full once more but too close to the leg-side and a cute glance beats the man at short fine leg and races away for four
full once more and the batsmen can only blocked back
lofted in to the gap at mid-off and picked up on the rope
faster ball which clips off the pads and runs to square leg. Half-appeal from Gayle and the keeper
fuller ball again and a powerful straight drive but Gayle gets his hands down quick to take a stunning catch. Good reflexes from the West Indies captain
straight drive back to Flynn
fended off to the covers and they sprint the single
full toss turned to midwicket to retain the strike
full delivery dug out back to the bowler who misfields

angled to square leg and confusion between the batsmen leaves them both stranded in the middle. A rash throw from square leg and the keeper's not at the stumps. The ball races away down through point and they pick up an overthrow
slower ball which Taylor misses going for the big shot
chipped away to long-off. Just doesn't quite carry
great shot! Short and wide and he puts it away over the rope with a smashing cut over cover
slower ball and a bottom edge in to the ground but they run one
full toss and a thin bottom edge somehow misses the stumps and runs down fine leg
full toss which is given the full treatment by Ross Taylor. Pulls the ball over square leg and it's still rising over the rope and finishes well out of the ground
on his toes and dug away to the bowler
slower ball which Taylor picks up. Down on one knee he pulls the ball over midwicket and it ends up in a building site outside off the ground. Stunning shot!
outside off-stump and Taylor misses this time
low full toss which is flicked through square leg and Ross Taylor holds on to the strike
full toss down the leg-side which clips the toe of Taylor's bat and runs away through his legs for four. Bit of fortune there
same ball and similar result but the keeper picks it up this time
fast and straighter ball which Taylor misses and it rips leg-stump out the ground. Good bowling but Taylor's done his damage
too far down the leg-side
slower ball catches an outside edge but drops just short of the keeper
slower ball pitched up. Wild swipe from Mills
short and wide and Mills goes for the flashing cut. He makes contact and the ball goes high and wide over third man
shorter slower ball which Flynn get's underneath too much and Fidel Edwards back pedals from extra cover to take a simple catch
drives it down to long-on
clubbed away along the ground to long-on
doesn't get hold of the big shot and the ball trundles along the ground to deep cover
driven away but picked up at long-off
straight drive and they turn quickly for two and a fumble in the field allows them to get home safely
